      • BleDescriptorOp

        public BleDescriptorOp​(BleDescriptorOp descOp)
        Constructor which creates a new BleDescriptorOp from the one given. This will only copy over the service, characteristic, and descriptor Uuids. It will NOT copy over any listeners, or filters.
